More Notes: Quarterly annualised CFC fell by 5.8% in Q2 2005 associated with Hurricanes Katrina and Rita under the old SNA before the 2008 implementation, in which full disaster costs were included in CFC.
Quarterly annualised CFC rose by 18.9% in Q3 2005 associated with Hurricanes Katrina and Rita under the old SNA before the 2008 implementation, in which full disaster costs were included in CFC.
